slickIHM

Class AbstractIHMComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.util.InputAdapter
      • org.newdawn.slick.gui.AbstractComponent
        • org.newdawn.slick.gui.MouseOverArea
          • slickIHM.AbstractIHMComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, IHMComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bouton, BoutonGroupable, Panel, Popup

    public abstract class AbstractIHMComponent
extends org.newdawn.slick.gui.MouseOverArea
implements IHMComponent
    Classe generique pour les composants d'IHM.
    Attention, si les classes heritants de cette classe veulent avoir un render particulier ou des actions specifiques aux events, il faut heriter des methodes doRender et actionXXX
    Author:
    Remynoschka
